Params[3]: Let me show you what I've got!
It has a hint of "that" Construct...
They're the same person, after all.
But charging forward without reservation has always been his style.

Params[2]: It's not the same if you watch closely.
Params[4]: There are still some subtle differences.

Params[2]: Just in terms of how he fights, Kamui's style used to be... purer.

Params[3]: Speaking in human terms, I suppose Kamui has changed mentally.
Humans or Constructs, no one can remember something like that without being affected.
